name: Get Started
description:
It is a racing game that has many different mechanics, from drifting to normal driving at 200 km / h. The goal in the game is to pass the track at the best time and get the maximum number of points. The number of points increases with each race. There is also a small Easter egg in the game, I hope you find it :)

Functions:
          •Customizing your car
           •Pleasant management
           •A fascinating card that will not let you get bored Control:
          •Handbrake - Space
          •Start/Stop engine key - I
          •Change camera - C
           •Indicator right - E
           •Indicator left - Q
           •Indicator hazart - Z
          •Boost - F
           •Look back - B
